Posts.Content: Jul 17, 2008 07:59PM JWallace wrote: Hello all, I have posted topics in another forum but saw this one and decided to see if anyone could help me breathe this thing out.  My mom has stage 3A breast cancer.  She had chemo first to try and shrink the tumor and then after surgery they said it didn't seem to shrink it much at all.  Come to find out her can has no hormone receptors and is HER2+ (??).  So she had surgery this past april 08 and now in July the cancer is back.  She is having the tests tomorrow to see if it has spread.  Can anyone provide anymore insight for me please??
Posts.Title: 80 % chance of it coming back!!! Naomi browneyes2323
